original_text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things, and to enter into his glory?
korean_text: 그리스도가 이런 고난을 받고 자기의 영광에 들어가야 할 것이 아니냐 하시고

sentences.original_text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도가 이 고난을 받지 않아야 했습니까

sentences.original_text: and to enter into his glory?
